item.title: Server/ section is gettin dead
item.dc:creator: @xx_matty_xx Justin Bieber
item.description:
@xx_matty_xx wrote:

[quote=“krackkid, post:8, topic:396472”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=493643.msg3609388#msg3609388 date=1306422568]
So effectively a whitelist system? And you think somehow that will increase server activity? If anything, it would finish it off.

Anyway, activity is bound to pick back up when kids start getting out of school, and 1.6 should be right around the corner.
[/quote]It actually works very well, Another server I play on has a good 10+ on most of the day. They use the same system, They have people complete a maze then email one of the admins who is in charge of it, Then that admin will come on and add the players to the group.

Just have it so people have to prove they signed up on the forums before adding them to the members group.[/quote]A whitelist is supposed to prevent griefing, thereby increasing the activity. But we don’t have a griefing problem because of the low activity, so why would it help?

Read full topic

item.title: Server/ section is gettin dead
item.dc:creator: @krackkid Krackkid
item.description:
@krackkid wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:7, topic:396472”]So effectively a whitelist system? And you think somehow that will increase server activity? If anything, it would finish it off.

Anyway, activity is bound to pick back up when kids start getting out of school, and 1.6 should be right around the corner.[/quote]It actually works very well, Another server I play on has a good 10+ on most of the day. They use the same system, They have people complete a maze then email one of the admins who is in charge of it, Then that admin will come on and add the players to the group.

Just have it so people have to prove they signed up on the forums before adding them to the members group.

Read full topic

item.title: Server/ section is gettin dead
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“krackkid, post:6, topic:396472”]Instead of forums intrebigwordthatIcbftogocopyandpaste, Not not just set up a very nice rank system?

Guest = Unable to build until giving member by a staff member(Can make them sign up in the forums, or something, etc)
Member = Able to build…

Then even Nim wouldn’t be able to log in, walk of and grief on a new account, unless a staff gave him member :/[/quote]

So effectively a whitelist system? And you think somehow that will increase server activity? If anything, it would finish it off.

Anyway, activity is bound to pick back up when kids start getting out of school, and 1.6 should be right around the corner.

Read full topic
